entry.title: Why are we setting up on Substack?
entry.summary: There's two types of subscription over on substack and both will get fresh new content emailed directly to their inbox or available on the Substack app - it's just that one will be premium and paid for and one is free. We hope that, after 18 years of free listening, you might think £3.50 a month is worth it…and even better when you consider that it’s not being back dated! (also - that’s the minimum substance subscription fee.)
